title: Shah directs security forces to launch anti-terror ops pro-actively in Jammu and Kashmir - Deccan Herald
content:
1. Shah directs security forces to launch anti-terror ops pro-actively in Jammu and Kashmir  Deccan Herald
  2. Amit Shah Reviews J&K Security Ahead Of Amarnath Yatra, RFID To Be Given To Pilgrims  ABP Live
  3. 'Eliminate terrorists': Amit Shah's clear message to security forces in Kashmir amid killings  Hindustan Times
  4. Amit Shah reviews Amarnath Yatra preparations, asks J&K officials to conduct pro-active anti-terror ops  India Today
  5. Home Minister Amit Shah takes stock of Amarnath Yatra preparations  Moneycontrol
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Union Home Minister Amit Shah on Tuesday directed security forces to conduct coordinated counter-terrorism operations pro-actively in Jammu and Kashmir. He also said that to fulfil Prime Minister Narendra Modi's vision of a prosperous and peaceful Jammu and Kashmir, the security forces should ensure zero cross-border infiltration to wipe out terrorism in the union territory, a home ministry statement said.
